model.name: Сценарий Workflow
model.description: description['code'] = obj.code description['name'] = obj.flow.name description['file_name'] = obj.code+'.xml' description['file_path'] = 'workflow'
model.import:
from apng_core.easyflow.models import Deployment try: obj = Deployment.objects.get(id=object_id) except Deployment.DoesNotExist: obj = Deployment() obj.id = object_id
obj.data = file_data obj._isImport = True obj.save()
